text: Carl Edwin Reichardt Jr. (July 6, 1931 - July 13, 2017) was an American banking executive. He was born in Houston, Texas. He was a graduate of the University of Southern California. During his career, he served as President of Wells Fargo & Company from 1978 through 1983. Reichardt also served on the boards of a number of corporations, include Pacific Gas & Electric, ConAgra, HCA, McKesson, HSBC Holdings PLC, and the Newhall Management Corporation. Reichardt died on July 13, 2017 at his home in Belvedere, California from cardiopulmonary arrest at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiopulmonary arrest Category:Disease-related deaths in California Category:Businesspeople from Houston
title: Carl E. Reichardt
